    @allure.title("Create Protocol and validate active residue verification SAL when surface area unit is sqcm")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol and validate active residue verification SAL "

    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cu7jd4z")
    @pytest.mark.formulation
    @pytest.mark.validate_active_residue_direct_indirect_sal_for_mg_sqcm
    def test_validate_active_residue_direct_indirect_sal_for_mg_sqcm(self):
        policy_data = {"useDosage": True, "useToxicity": True, "useProductLimit": True, "useARL": True,
                       "salMassUnit": "mg", "ignoreCombo": False}
        active_data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_active_policy.test_get_active_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        sal_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["productAndEquipmentLimits"]["salMassUnit"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_active_pyload(get_policy, policy_data)
        active_data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        policy_data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQCM)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(policy_data)
        unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(policy_data)["response"]
        unit = json.loads(unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"] or sal_unit != "mg" or unit != "sqcm":
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        columns_prod = ["production_id"]
